channel.title: Making Shops!
channel.description:
Im stuck on how to make new shops can someone link me a tutorial or help me please?
and yes i tried searching but couldnt find anything usefull :(
thanks
if it helps im using the butterdream scape source

item.title: Making Shops!
item.dc:creator: @bluebort bluebort
item.description:
@bluebort wrote:

yeh im getting used to it now and i said i searched lol but ill have a look at yer tutorial thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Making Shops!
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

Making a shop is one of the simplest things you can do. If you have a 317 I know for a fact that there is a tutorial in the tutorial section because i made it myself. So at least try and look for a tutorial before you post asking for help.

If its a 508 then you source should already have a few shops in it and just figure out how it works. I know it may sound hard but I did it! Its actually fairly easy once you know what your doing!

Read full topic

item.title: Making Shops!
item.dc:creator: @barelypassing barelypassing
item.description:
@barelypassing wrote:

I don’t think you need anything in client.java. Class.java though? Is that 508 or something because I don’t think it exists…

Read full topic

item.title: Making Shops!
item.dc:creator: @software software
item.description:
@software wrote:

Hmm, Its in config, file called shops.gfg just take a look of the other shop lines think it 5mins and u should know how to add em, Also when want to add it to npc its like,

if (npcid == #) { wanneshop = #; }

Simple huh?

Read full topic
